attributes.action: No "childcare vouchers" for high earners on £300,0000 a year
attributes.additional_details: High earners should not be entitled to benefits such as childcare vouchers when our elderly and disabled have had their benefits slashed. £300,0000 a year for a couple is an obscene amount of money and any couple earning over £35000 a year should not be expecting any handouts whatsoever. The government should not be paying people to breed, the planet is full.
